title: How to help quake victims
author: The Apseattle Times Staff
text: The following aid agencies are accepting contributions for assistance to victims of the earthquake in Turkey: Local contacts      --  World Concern can accept only cash donations. The phone number is 1-800-755-5022.     --  A Turkish Consulate Earthquake Fund has been set up with CityBank. Donations can be made to an account numbered 601421100 and routing number 32271724.     --  The Turkish American Cultural Association's state branch has set up an account with Washington Mutual Bank to take donations. The account number for the Turkey Earthquake Fund is 195-327160-7. To donate supplies for the association's relief effort, call 425-739-6722.
